name: postybirb-plus
description: Currently a reason to learn React. May end up being something more.

scripts.build:ui: cd ui && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build:app: cd electron-app && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:ui && npm run build:app
scripts.release:windows: npm run build && cd electron-app && npm run release:windows

author: Michael DiCarlo
